conversations.body_text: Hi Francisco Vega,    Please open the "Vibration Feedback" interface in SIMSONN MANAGER 2.0.8 and check if the power indicator is green. A green icon means the power is successfully connected. You can test the vibration function directly on this screen.  If the device is not shown as connected, try reconnecting the USB and power cables. Make sure to plug in the USB first, then the power, to ensure proper initialization.     Please make sure you are using SimHub version 9.9.3 to ensure full compatibility and feature support.
Hi Francisco Vega,  Didn't we include a user manual with the product? There should be a small booklet provided in the package.
ID 为 1261 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单1261  
      主题: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1746, how did it go?  
      描述:  
 
         Need help getting the product to work. I have updated the SIMSONN manager and am also using SIMHUB.  
   
        
         
             
                
                 
                    On Thursday, July 3, 2025 at 06:35:01 PM PDT, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:
                 
                   
                   
                  
 
 
 Hello Francisco,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 

 
  
  
 Hello Francisco,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.

Hi Francisco Vega,   You’re using the ProX Ultra controller and the VAM Pro motor, correct? Please connect the USB first, and then plug in the power supply. The interface I sent should show a green indicator confirming the power is connected—once you see that, you can proceed to test the vibration.
